item.title: Bonnaz Embroidery
item.description: Ruth Franklin covers everything from machine operation, troubleshooting machine problems, industry professionalism to pricing embroidery work. Every page contains details regarding bonnaz embroidery and comes with the authority and experience of a 40+ year veteran. It is highly recommended that all chain stitch operators have a printed copy of this book to reference. Extra effort when digitizing the original documents was taken to also allow for searching the pdf for keywords and phrase matches.

item.title: Ruth Franklin's Instructional Video
item.description: The Artistic Touch School of Embroidery Video gives all of the information needed to learn to operate a chain stitch embroidery machine. The video is a recording of Ruth Franklin herself and covers everything that was taught to her students in person. The full 2hr instructional video can be found in its original quality below. Its accompanying transcript is available for download as well. item.title: The Artistic Touch Lettering Book
item.description: The Lettering Book contains lettering styles, placement, templating examples and clip art all accumulated by Ruth during her 40yrs of running an embroidery art business. item.title: The Monogram Design Book
item.description: The Monogram Design Book is 277 pages and covers monograms on the Singer 114w103 chain stitch embroidery machine. Ruth goes over the basics of monogram application, sizing and pricing. It also contains a few hundred design examples and alphabets to reference.
